creator: csharp@mac.com
text:
The testsuite target in the main build.xml calls the jakarta-slide/testsuite/build.xml build script. 
The testsuite/build.xml script does not contain jdom, xmlunit, or oro in the classpath. Patch 
included with this bug. Note, adding oro/xmlunit to build.properties too.

Created attachment 8300
Build.xml patch to allow testsuite to build.
creator: csharp@mac.com
csharp@mac.com
text:
Created attachment 8301
Patch that declares property values for oro and xmlunit for testsuite.
